title: Controlling the Human Mind - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/17
itunes:title: Controlling the Human Mind - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/17
description:
George Noory and researcher Dr. Nick Begich examine his work on human mind control, and how ESP and other mind powers can be misused for evil purposes but also be a tool to enhance human performance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
